AT.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed™
AT.description: Sonic und die All-Stars messen sich erneut in einem ultimativen Rennen. Nimm an Rennen teil, die an Land, auf dem Wasser und in der Luft mit unglaublichen Fahrzeugen stattfinden. Die Fahrzeuge können sich mitten im Rennen in Autos, Boote und Flugzeuge verwandeln. Stelle deine Fahr- und Flugkünste beim Driften, Rollen und Boosten unter Beweis und überhole deine Gegner oder setze deine Waffen taktisch ein und entfessle deine All-Star-Spezialfähigkeit, um am Ende ganz vorne zu landen.

AU.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed™
AU.description: Sonic and the All-Stars cast line up on the starting grid once again to battle for supremacy in the ultimate race. Compete across land, water and air in incredible transforming vehicles that change from cars to boats to planes mid-race. Master your driving skills as you drift, barrel role and boost to overtake your rivals, or use your weapons tactically and unleash your All-Star move to gain the winning advantage.

BG.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed™
BG.description: Sonic and the All-Stars cast line up on the starting grid once again to battle for supremacy in the ultimate race. Compete across land, water and air in incredible transforming vehicles that change from cars to boats to planes mid-race. Master your driving skills as you drift, barrel role and boost to overtake your rivals, or use your weapons tactically and unleash your All-Star move to gain the winning advantage.

BE.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed™
BE.description: Sonic et l'équipe des All-Stars s'alignent une fois encore sur la grille de départ pour asseoir leur domination dans la course ultime. Entrez en compétition entre ciel, terre et mer, dans d'incroyables véhicules transformables qui passent de voitures à bateaux jusqu'aux avions en cours de course. Maîtrisez vos compétences de pilotage à coups de dérapages, tonneaux et turbo pour éliminer vos adversaires, ou utilisez stratégiquement vos armes et déchaînez votre attaque All-Star pour obtenir un avantage décisif.

ES.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed™
ES.description: Sonic y el elenco de All-Stars vuelven a la parrilla inicial para luchar por la supremacía en la carrera definitiva. Compite por tierra, mar y aire en increíbles vehículos que se transforman de coches a barcos o aviones en mitad de la carrera. Domina tus habilidades al volante mientras derrapas, haces trompos y pegas acelerones para adelantar a tus rivales; o bien usa tus armas con astucia y emplea tu movimiento All-Star para obtener la ventaja que te otorgará la victoria.

IT.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed™
IT.description: Sonic e il cast di All-Stars tornano sulla griglia di partenza pronti a lottare nuovamente per la supremazia nella gara definitiva. Gareggia per terra, mare e cielo su incredibili veicoli trasformabili che cambiano da auto a barche ad aerei in piena gara. Diventa un campione mentre derapi, viri e acceleri per superare i tuoi rivali, o usa le tue armi con strategia e scatena le tue mosse All-Stars per guadagnarti la vittoria.

LT.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed™
LT.description: Sonic and the All-Stars cast line up on the starting grid once again to battle for supremacy in the ultimate race. NO.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed™

Master your driving skills as you drift, barrel role and boost to overtake your rivals, or use your weapons tactically and unleash your All-Star move to gain the winning advantage.

NL.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed™
NL.description: Sonic en de All-Stars staan weer in de startblokken om te strijden om de overwinning in de ultieme race. Ga ervoor op het land, het water en in de lucht in ongelooflijke voertuigen die midden in de race veranderen van auto's in boten en vliegtuigen. Perfectioneer je rijvaardigheid terwijl je slipt, een kurkentrekker doet of plankgas geeft of gebruik je wapens met beleid en zet je All-star move in om de overhand te krijgen.

NZ.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed™
NZ.description: Sonic and the All-Stars cast line up on the starting grid once again to battle for supremacy in the ultimate race. Compete across land, water and air in incredible transforming vehicles that change from cars to boats to planes mid-race. Master your driving skills as you drift, barrel role and boost to overtake your rivals, or use your weapons tactically and unleash your All-Star move to gain the winning advantage.

PT.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed™
PT.description: Sonic e o elenco All-Stars alinham-se na linha de partida uma vez mais, para lutar pela supremacia numa derradeira corrida. Compete por terra, água e ar, em incríveis veículos transformáveis, que mudam de carro para avião em plena corrida. Domina as tuas habilidades de condução, derrapando, rolando e acelerando para ultrapassares os teus rivais, ou usa as tuas armas de forma táctica, e liberta o teu movimento All-Star para ganhares a vantagem que te dará a vitória.

RU.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed™
RU.description: Sonic и команда All-Stars снова замерли на стартовых позициях, чтобы выявить лучшего в итоговом состязании! Соревнуйтесь на суше, воде и в воздухе в невероятных болидах, которые прямо по ходу гонки превращаются то в машины, то в лодки, то в самолеты! Оттачивайте свои навыки: входите в занос, маневрируйте и ускоряйтесь, чтобы оставить соперников позади. С умом применяйте оружие и задействуйте уникальную All-Star-способность, чтобы добиться победы!
